title: Add me as a friend, cuz I have no friends.

replies.body:
Say something funny or nice every game, you'll get plenty of friends.

I had at least 30 guys who I've only had one match with. In level 15.

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NU3m6s7O,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-07-29T11:46:37.318+0000)
>
> Say something funny or nice every game, you'll get plenty of friends.
> 
> I had at least 30 guys who I've only had one match with. In level 15.

or go 69/1/0 and they'll add you because they think you're good

damn does it really take 69? All I do is get 10/3/10 and everyone goes mad.

One day I'll get 40 kills... One day... And a Penta. I've never gotten a penta before :(

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NU3m6s7O,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2015-07-29T12:10:01.312+0000)
>
> damn does it really take 69? All I do is get 10/3/10 and everyone goes mad.
> 
> One day I'll get 40 kills... One day... And a Penta. I've never gotten a penta before :(

i never had a penta either 
had 1 unofficial, but its in a b5 game, doesn't really count i guess

1 day

side note: is it me or did you install fek?

Can't even get a penta in bots.

And yes, I did install F.E.K

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NU3m6s7O,comment-id=00050000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-30T05:23:39.526+0000)
>
> Can't even get a penta in bots.
> 
> And yes, I did install F.E.K

Excellent

it has begun >=)
Well I got to level 30 less than a day ago so now I might be able to get bot Pentas.

dw here is step to max friendship

1. buy zed
2. make lcs plays
3. profit????

I am {{champion:32}} why can't I be yours

(doll op 4eva)

DW, ILL BE YOUR FRIEND!
CAUSE I'VE GOT NOTHING BETTER TO DO (apart from school)
SO YEAH
ADD MEH!
I'm always down for a game in the evenings - add me if keen {{summoner:31}}
